name: Do me.
about: Do me is a GTD type web app that helps boost productivity for people that have a hard time commiting to a schedule

name: notARealStore
about: notArealStore is a complete online store where you can find urban style clothes and accesories for men.

name: Blank Page
about: Blank Page is a simple but highly useful AI powered tool for artists and creators to get out of a creative block. With one click, Blank Page provides you with an AI generated premise for your next story, ilustration, animation, you name it.
